title: Patch Notes
content: e mounds. Moved Player 3's Traveller's Chest out of Wyll's tent in the owlbear cave camp in Act I. Improved the position of and interaction with the Strangledeath Manifesto. Fixed a table you could walk through in Waukeen's Rest. Fixed a group of random refugees spawning on one of the boats in the Lower City Harbour. Fixed a bug where teleporting using the 'A Magical Journey' painting and then clicking on the ladder would give you a 'Can't get there' error. Fixed the camera getting stuck in the
